title: Can't dynamic queue
body: Me/Friends are getting either an error "Client has encountered a critical error" when we try to join. Then there are times when they join but get immediately kicked off. Then there's one last kick in the shin by letting us queue and then giving us "group has disbanded" error. PLEASE. HALP.

replies.body: Yeah it's been happening for a while, just got to bare with Riot while they fix things.
sounds like the same as i am getting.
